item.title: Removing a Players PKP When he Buys Something
item.dc:creator: @Fluffys Fluffys
item.description:
@Fluffys wrote:

ok so i made dialouge for an NPC who sells 1M cash for 1PKP. on the dialogue, when you click"1M for 1PKP it is supposed to give you 1M cash and remove 1PKP. when you click on it it gives you 1M but takes away 1.5m. i want it to take away 1PKP instead of 1.5m. any help? heres my code.

} else if(c.dialogueAction == 28) {
c.getItems().addItem(995,1000000);
c.getItems().deleteItem(995, c.getItems().getItemSlot(995), 1500000);

and i need the .deleteitem to delete 1 pkp. know how to do this?

Read full topic
item.source: Removing a Players PKP When he Buys Something
